snippet: An explosion hit one of the entrances of Camp Eggers, a predominantly American military base, but the extent of the blast or the cause was not immediately clear.
abstract: Taliban claims responsibility for explosion near entrance to Camp Eggers, predominantly American military base in Kabul, Afghanistan, but extent and cause of blast remain unclear; American service member is killed by suicide bomber in separate attack in eastern Afghanistan.

byline.contributor: Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: An explosion hit one of the entrances of Camp Eggers, a predominantly American military base, but the extent of the blast or the cause was not immediately clear.

headline.main: Blast Hits Kabul Military Base, and Eastern Afghanistan Bombing Kills American
headline.print_headline: Blast Hits Kabul Military Base, and Eastern Afghanistan Bombing Kills American

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
